# Latin Square Design (LSD)

    varieties of wheat. The layout data pertaining to yield are given
    below. Analyse the data

  --------------------------------------------------------------------------
  E 7            C 11           B 6            A 5            D 6
  -------------- -------------- -------------- -------------- --------------
  A 3            E 7            C 11           D 7            B 5

  B 4            D 8            A 4            C 9            E 8

  D 8            A 5            E 9            B 4            C 12

  C 10           B 5            D 9            E 8            A 4
  --------------------------------------------------------------------------
